events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and are excited to review their qualifications.
The application has been categorized under the engineering department due to the candidate's background in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process.
Initial phone screening was completed where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software engineering principles.
The candidate responded promptly confirming their availability for the next round of technical interviews next week.
Technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for May 15th to assess coding and system design skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview, impressing the interviewers with their problem-solving and coding abilities.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and employment terms following technical interview success.
HR interview was completed successfully; the candidate expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and starting date for the software engineer role.
Candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join our development team.
The candidate has formally accepted the offer and will begin onboarding according to the agreed schedule.
Onboarding activities have started with the new engineer, including system access setup and orientation sessions.
The hiring process is now closed successfully; the new software engineer is fully integrated into the team.
